He drilled lower just as the laser blast passed over him. He could feel the=
 heat from the beam. He pops out of the hole."Who the hell just shot at me?=
 DrillBit, TERRORIZE!"He transformes to bot mode, his gattaling gun ready."=
Did you guys see where that came from?"

{Nightshade}

    Nightshade had r=
eturned to her beast form when she had completed her report and had sat bac=
k watching as others got their hands dirty doing the digging, when the beam=
 has slide just past Drillbits head her ears perked up, her fox eyes narrow=
ing as she began tracing the beams trajectort back towards it's source, "Gi=
ve me a nano, tracking..." she growled as she tensed up ready to spring asi=
de if any shots game her way but she doubted the would be attacker would ma=
ke such a mistake as to try a second shot from the same position...
